definition: flat/(coll.) to beat (sb) up/old variant of 匾[bian3]

sentences.english: I don't want my tonsils out.
Does chronic quinsy have Chinese traditional medicine to administer a law?
sentences.chinese: 慢性扁桃腺炎有中药治法吗？

sentences.english: The term usually refers to the palatine tonsils on each side of the oropharynx.
sentences.chinese: 扁桃腺一词通常指口咽部两侧的颚扁桃腺。

sentences.english: The term usually refers to the palatine tonsils on each side of the oropharynx.
sentences.chinese: 扁桃腺一词通常指口咽部两侧的颚扁桃腺。

sentences.english: You'll have your tonsils out tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 明天，你的扁桃腺一切除。

sentences.english: The oropharynx contains the palatine tonsils.
Children with enlarged tonsils and adenoids may have repeated episodes of bronchitis.
sentences.chinese: 扁桃腺肿大的儿童可能反复急性支气管炎发作。

sentences.english: The doctor cut out his tonsils.
sentences.chinese: 医生切除了他的扁桃腺。

sentences.english: But if I have my tonsils out tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我如果明天切除扁桃腺。

sentences.english: Removing tonsils is a kind of simple operation.
sentences.chinese: 切除扁桃腺是一种小手术。

sentences.english: My tonsils are as big as rocks.
sentences.chinese: 我的扁桃腺像石块一样大。

sentences.english: She had her tonsils out last year.
sentences.chinese: 她是去年摘除的扁桃腺。

sentences.english: I went to hospital to have my tonsils out.
Enlarged adenoids may restrict the breathing of children.
sentences.chinese: 扁桃腺肥大可能会限制孩子的呼吸。

sentences.english: Her tonsil would irritate when getting a cold.
sentences.chinese: 她一感冒，扁桃腺就会发炎。

sentences.english: If she have a cold,her amygdalae will be inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 她一感冒，扁桃腺就会发炎。
